content: 在这款游戏中，一旦落单死亡玩家就会被AI替代，它会复制你的长相，甚至用你的声音和行为混入团队，继续和队友交流，并伺机而动刀掉所有玩家。这就是全新多人联机AI生存恐怖游戏，游戏支持中文，支持四人联机。你和小伙伴白天需要乘坐电车一路跑图，搜刮资源，维持电车的行驶，到了夜晚则要躲避怪物和诅咒之语，一旦下车落单就会遭遇恐怖袭击，这时雷亚就会取代你继续伺机而动，因此你们将会时刻陷入对队友真实身份的质疑，为了生存和取得彼此的信任，你们只有不断自证清白，才能和队友一起逃出生天活下去。游戏将于10月27日上线，快叫上你的小伙伴一起冲吧。关注熊喵，玩游戏不迷路。

key_facts: FACT: In the game, a dead player is replaced by an AI that mimics their appearance and voice.
FACT: The AI-controlled replacement continues interacting with teammates to blend in and attack them.
FACT: The game supports Chinese language and four-player online multiplayer mode.
FACT: Players travel through maps via a moving train during daytime to gather resources.
FACT: The train must be maintained to keep running throughout the journey.
FACT: Nighttime introduces monsters and cursed whispers as primary threats.
FACT: Falling off the train at night leads to immediate ambush by supernatural forces.
FACT: The AI replacement (Rea) takes over after a player's death and remains undetected initially.
FACT: Players must constantly prove their identity to maintain trust among teammates.
FACT: The game's core mechanic revolves around suspicion and self-verification for survival.
FACT: The game launches on October 27th and supports cooperative gameplay.
FACT: Trust and identity verification are essential mechanics for team survival.
key_opinions: OPINION: The AI replacement mechanic creates intense psychological tension and paranoia.
OPINION: The blend of cooperation and deception makes it one of the most innovative horror games.
OPINION: The voice mimicry feature adds a disturbing layer of realism to the horror experience.
OPINION: The daytime train mechanic offers a unique rhythm to the survival loop.
OPINION: The constant fear of betrayal may alienate players who dislike social distrust mechanics.
OPINION: The game’s reliance on player trust could lead to more meaningful emergent stories.
key_datapoints: DATA: Game supports four-player online co-op gameplay.
DATA: Game features full Chinese language support.
DATA: Players must maintain a moving train to progress through the map.
DATA: Nighttime triggers monster attacks and cursed whisper events.
DATA: Falling off the train at night results in instant death or AI takeover.
DATA: AI replacement uses the player’s voice and behavior patterns.
DATA: Survival depends on continuous self-verification among teammates.
